name: Point Axis Target
description: Create a PointAxisTarget from a Point and a Vector.

inputParameters.name: point
inputParameters.description: The target point defined relative to the robot's base coordinate frame (RCF). Accepts Rhino / Grasshopper Point or COMPAS Point.

inputParameters.name: target_z_vector
inputParameters.description: The target axis is defined by the target_point and pointing towards this vector. The tool tip coordinate frame (TCF)'s Z axis can rotate around this axis. Accepts Rhino / Grasshopper Vector or COMPAS Vector.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_position
inputParameters.description: The allowed tolerance of the tool reaching the target point.

inputParameters.name: tool_coordinate_frame
inputParameters.description: The tool tip coordinate frame relative to the flange coordinate frame of the robot. If not specified, the target point is relative to the robot's flange (T0CF). Accepts Rhino / Grasshopper Frame or COMPAS Frame.
